title: Little Nemo - Sounds in The Attic &  Private Life EP
description:
Little Nemo was an obscure Dark Wave band from France. This torrent contains their 1988 EP "Private Life" and their 1989 album, "Sounds in The Attic". Wonderful cold/dark wave with plenty of melancholy and delicious sadness. If you like a torrent, please help seeding it as for instance I had posted this one a year back which is now dead with no seeds and a few people wanting it.

1    New Flood (4:14)

3    Marine (3:33) 
4    Sandcastle (4:01) 
5    Johnny Got His Gun (1:43)

Little Nemo:

Olivier [aka Holyvier] Champeau (vocal, keyboards), Vincent [aka Vince] Legallo (guitar, bass, rythm box), Nicolas [aka Bill] Dufaure (bass, 1988-93), Georges Remiet (guitar, 1990-93), Ronan Lesergeant (keyboards, 1990-93), Yves Charreire (drums, 1990-93)
